definition: what is your surname?/(May I ask) your surname?

sentences.english: The name of the being you are calling, please?
sentences.chinese: 請問受話人的貴姓大名？

sentences.english: I do not even know your name.
sentences.chinese: 我連您貴姓也還不知道。

sentences.english: We have two Mikes here. Could you tell me his last name, please?
sentences.chinese: 我們這裏有兩個邁克。可不可以請你告訴我他貴姓呢？

sentences.english: Pardon me, monsieur the inn-keeper, but what is your name?
sentences.chinese: 對不起，客店老闆先生，您貴姓？

sentences.english: The name of the person you are calling, please?
sentences.chinese: 請問受話人的貴姓臺甫？

definition: to make fun of/to seek diversion
bring it on!/give me all you got!
lit. dressed up animal (idiom)/fig. immoral and despicable person
lit. rarely seen, very strange (idiom); to express amazement due to lack of experience/naive expression of excitement due to ignorance
to tell the truth/to tell it as it is
to step down gracefully (humble expression)/to concede defeat/to play second fiddle
to knock sb out with a drug/to render sb unconscious
worse than a dog or pig/lower than low
to show off/to put on a show to amuse others
(Wu dialect) bum/wretched-looking tramp who lives by begging or stealing
to face the wall and ponder about one's misdeeds/to stand in the corner (punishment)/(fig.) to examine one's conscience
